Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class PerformanceCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.PerformanceCounter

  • public final class PerformanceCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides global access to performance counts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PerformanceCounter.Usage
      Tracks the average time usage of a game system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void end​(GameSystem system)
      Sets the usage time of system as μs since the last invocation of start() and resets the shared time counter.
      static void start​()
      Sets the shared time counter to the current system time.
      static java.lang.Iterable<PerformanceCounter.Usage> usages​()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start​()
        Sets the shared time counter to the current system time.

      • end

        public static void end​(GameSystem system)
        Sets the usage time of system as μs since the last invocation of start() and resets the shared time counter.
        Parameters:
        system - game system to set usage of

      • usages

        public static java.lang.Iterable<PerformanceCounter.Usage> usages​()
        Returns:
